name: The Wanderings Dragon
description:
The game takes place in the distant past, when the dragons lived on the ground, and people hid in the castles.
But our dragon is special, it is not like everyone else. And all because he eats only with apples and thorns, and not with human flesh.
Your task is to feed the dragon, to visit distant lands and find food everywhere to feed yourself.
You will need all your savvy, agility and skill, so as not to get into a trap or danger and reach the end. The game is designed for children, but sure and adults will get a lot of fun if they pass it.
In this exciting platform you are waiting for traps and puzzles, interesting and beautiful landscapes and a sea of ​​positive!

Features:
- Bright, pleasant graphics
- Good soundtrack
- Fascinating gameplay
- Secret locations
